title: Rav Yitzchok Wasserman's Wife Passes
body: Rebbetzin Reva Wasserman, 87, passed away. She was the wife of Rav Yitzchok Wasserman, rosh yeshiva of Yeshiva Toras Chaim of Denver, and daughter of R' Moshe Shimon Bayarsky z"l of Baltimore.

title: New Leaders Elected in Rockland
body: Rockland County voters turned out in force, electing new leaders in Spring Valley, including Rabbi Yosef Hersch Gross and Rabbi Yakov Yosef Kaufman as Trustees. Schenley Vital won the mayoral seat.

title: Lakewood Election Results
body: Rabbi Moshe B. Raitzik won the Board of Fire Commissioners with 4,696 votes, while Isaac Akerman secured reelection to the Lakewood Township Committee with 16,841 votes, defeating Harriet Goldberg.
